subject: Re: Question on how fast the bands should sweep
author: itcdeadpeople
full_text:
Thanks for the update, Kay.  I've also noticed varying sweep times between AM & FM on other 
models.  Not sure if the actual rate of sweep differs, for just the amount of channels there is 
to be swept on one band versus another, so it takes longer to complete one full cycle.

Margaret
